# NSPersistentHistoryTrackingKey

**Global Variable**

The key you use to enable persistent history tracking.

## Declaration

```swift
let NSPersistentHistoryTrackingKey: String
```

## Discussion

Persistent history tracking is off by default.

## Maintaining a record of changes

- **currentPersistentHistoryToken(fromStores:)**: Returns a single persistent history token representing all of the specified stores.

items.description: Returns a single persistent history token representing all of the specified stores.
items.name: currentPersistentHistoryToken(fromStores:)
